charges.charge_description: 18:641 THEFT OF GOVERNMENT PROPERTY (Count 1: $250,000-10 years; S/A: $100.00; 3 yrs Supervised Release) and AIDING AND ABETTING-18 USC 2 (1)

charges.charge_disposition: Defendant, Ronald Dearing sentenced on Count 1: Fine: $2,000; S/A: $100.00; Restitution: $1,260.00--operations &; maintenance budget dept @ WPAFB; Probation: 3 years; Restitution and S/A to be pd not later than 6 mos prior to completion of probation (w/in 1st 30 months of probation); 100 hours of community service within 1st 2 yrs of probation if his health permits; deft must make himself available for substance abuse testing and/or treatment--waived; the 1st 6 mos are to be spent in home confinement without electronic monitoring with release privileges for work, medical needs and community service obligation; deft's rights explained and understood (1)
